name: Zenith 280 PIERCE VertiLift Elevating Hylo Adjusting Table
descr:
280-Zenith PIERCE VertiLift Elevating Hylo Adjusting Table

This variable height table saves wear and tear on you. It also incorporates our unique Key Dimension headpiece. This exclusive headpiece was designed for positioning patients for 3rd dimension and cervical circumduction correction. 

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty 
Key Dimension Headpiece positions patients for 3rd dimension and cervical circumduction correction 
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts for ideal set-up 
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Soft Hinged Dorsal 
Terminal Point Dorsal Drop - Manual 
Swing Away Abdominal- Single Tension 
Slide & Crank Pelvic 
Terminal Point Pelvic Drop w/ lo-force mechanism 
Adjustable Front Section 
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion 
Dual footswitches for easy access up, down, and stop 
Front mounted up, down, and stop switches 
Tuckaway Foot Board w/ Auto Relaxer 
Heritage Upholstery in a variety of colors 
Base colors available in many coordinating colors 
Table Length 78 
Table Height varies from 24 to 30 
Table Width 24 
Cushion Width 18 
Table Weight 525 lbs. depending on options
